statements.name: PROC SMSELECT
statements.help:
PROC SMSELECT  NAME=libref.data-table<options>;                 
	OUTPUT  OUT=libref.data-table;                 
	PROJECT  ID=project-ID<options>;

arguments.name: NAME=
arguments.description: specifies the SAS data table (project repository) that contains calibrated projects for which the model selection is to be performed

arguments.name: INPUT=
arguments.description: specifies the SAS data table that contains holdout statistics for all calibrated models

statements.name: OUTPUT
statements.description: generates the output for the selected models

arguments.name: OUT=
arguments.description: specifies the SAS data table to contain the output for the selected models

statements.name: PROJECT
statements.description: specifies the subset of the projects from the current project repository for which model selection is to be performed

arguments.name: BEST=
arguments.description: specifies how many best models to select for each of the projects listed in the ID= option

arguments.name: MODELID=
arguments.description: specifies the IDs for the models to be selected

arguments.name: SELECT=
arguments.description: specifies the model selection criterion: mean absolute percentage error (MAPE) or root mean square error (RMSE)
